propose.from sentence: We propose a novel tagging scheme and an end -toend model with biased objective function to jointly extract entities and their relations .

\" Other \" tag.means: corresponding word is independent of the extracted results

Tag \" O \".from sentence: Tag " O " represents the " Other " tag , which means that the corresponding word is independent of the extracted results .

produce.from sentence: In this paper , we investigate an end - toend model to produce the tags sequence as shows .

End - to - end Model.from sentence:
The End - to - end Model
It contains a bi-directional Long Short Term Memory ( Bi - LSTM ) layer to encode the input sentence and a LSTM - based decoding layer with biased loss .
The biased loss can enhance the relevance of entity tags .

use.from sentence: We use the " BIES " ( Begin , Inside , End , Single ) signs to represent the position information of a word in the entity .
